tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE work_in_progress_inventory ( 
 production_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
 product_name TEXT, 
 quantity INT, 
 work_station TEXT, 
 worker_id INT, 
 start_time TIMESTAMP, 
 end_time TIMESTAMP 
);

CREATE TABLE work_in_progress_inventory (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  product_name VARCHAR(255),
  quantity INT,
  production_date DATE,
  status VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE production_flow (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  step_name VARCHAR(255),
  start_time DATETIME,
  end_time DATETIME,
  worker_name VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE work_in_progress_inventory (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_name VARCHAR(255),
    quantity INT,
    location VARCHAR(255),
    in_production BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE production_flow_monitor (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_name VARCHAR(255),
    production_stage INT,
    status VARCHAR(255),
    last_updated TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE lean_manufacturing_info (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_name VARCHAR(255),
    current_stage INT,
    cycle_time INT,
    current_lead_time INT
)

CREATE TABLE AssemblyLine(
    assembly_line_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    line_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    line_leader VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    workstation_id INT NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (workstation_id) REFERENCES Workstations(workstation_id)
);

CREATE TABLE work_orders (
  order_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  product_id INT,
  order_date DATE,
  quantity INT
)

CREATE TABLE products (
  product_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  product_name VARCHAR(50),
  unit_price DECIMAL(10,2)
)

CREATE TABLE production_lines (
  line_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  line_name VARCHAR(50),
  supervisor_id INT
)

CREATE TABLE inventory (
  product_id INT,
  quantity_available INT,
  last_updated TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE production_logs (
  log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  line_id INT,
  order_id INT,
  start_time TIMESTAMP,
  end_time TIMESTAMP
)
